name: part_002
file: tmp_【 ごちそうさまでした 】沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブ【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [F9lbxgimNIE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: An opening montage showcasing photos and cherished memories from Sakamata Chloe's career.
A cinematic scene of Sakamata Chloe in her room, quietly reflecting while looking at her mask and an album.
Transition to the live stage as the graduation performance begins with an a capella intro.
Full performance of 'Our Bright Parade' featuring a heartfelt greeting to the fans.

subtitles.original: 沙花叉クロヱ 卒業ライブ
ぱれぱれぱれ　輝くんだよ

subtitles.english: With the signal of our calling voices

subtitles.original: ぱれぱれぱれ　探しに行く
subtitles.english: Pare, Pare, Pare - let's go search for it

subtitles.original: スタートは何度だって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times we start

subtitles.original:
Our Bright Parade
作詞・作曲・編曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Our Bright Parade
Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は沙花叉の卒業ライブに来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming to Sakamata's graduation live today!

subtitles.original: 精一杯頑張りますので、応援よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'll do my absolute best, so please support me!
I still wrote down my soliloquies

subtitles.original: ただ始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I ran because I just wanted to begin
Lit up in the distant darkness

subtitles.original: それは眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That name was far too bright

subtitles.original: それは優しすぎる思い出
subtitles.english: Those memories are far too kind

subtitles.original: もっと近づけと手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out my hand to get closer

subtitles.original: 思いがけず結び合った
